summary: When artist and street performer Fletcher (Brendan Fraser) thinks con-artist Roz (Joanna Going) is the woman he has seen in a vision, he has no idea she sees him as her next victim.

keywords: the alamo|garden party|love shrine|rock cairn|familial dreams
title: Unidos por el destino
